title: Senators Grill NASA Nominee Over Leaked Plan to Slash Science and Privatize Space
description: “I do stand behind everything in the document.”
content: Billionaire tech entrepreneur Jared Isaacman returned to Capitol Hill Wednesday for his second confirmation hearing for the role of NASA administrator. Members of the Senate Committee on Commerce, Sc… [+4733 chars]
